segments.text: Oh , the food here really is bad . My soup was cold and meat , ur ... it was like leather .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And they don ’ t give you very much either . I ’ m still hungry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sure this one is especially bad . And the word is so unpleasant .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t do this ! Don ’ t do that ! You mustn ’ t do this ! You can ’ t do that !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I ’ m going to write a letter of complaint .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And we ’ ll all help you .
segments.speaker: S2
